```{r}
df <- read_excel("/Users/jann/Desktop/sf1truth.xlsx", sheet=1, col_names=F)
head(df)
```


```{r}
boolean = ''
for(target in 1:nrow(df)){
  influencers = which(df[target,] >= 0.12)
  inputVariables = ''
  polynomialFunction = ''
  for(input in influencers){
    QUOTExNUMquote = paste0('\"x' , input , '\"')
    if(input != influencers[1]){
      inputVariables = paste0(inputVariables, ',' , QUOTExNUMquote)
    } else{
      inputVariables = paste0(inputVariables, QUOTExNUMquote)
    }
    polynomialFunction = paste0(polynomialFunction, "")
  }
  
  oneFX = paste0('{\n\"functions\": [\n{\n\"inputVariables\": [' , inputVariables , '],\n\"polynomialFunction\": \"' , polynomialFunction, '\",\n\"score\": 1\n}\n],\n\"target\": \"x' , target, '\"\n},\n')
  boolean = paste0(boolean, oneFX)
}

cat(boolean)

```
